Name: Verify Contact Us Link Navigation
Description: Navigate to the English page and click on the Contact Us link. Verify that the user is redirected to the home page.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /en
Step 2: Click on link contactUs -> Navigate to page ''
Step 3: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Continue Shopping After Checkout
Description: Navigate to the English page, click on the checkout button, and then continue shopping. Verify that the user is redirected to the English page.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /en
Step 2: Click on span buttonPlaceholder -> Navigate to page '/checkout'
Step 3: Click on button continueShopping -> Navigate to page '/en'
Step 4: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Navigate to Promotions and Verify Page
Description: Access the collections page, go to the homepage, view promotions, and verify the promotions page before closing it.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /en/collections/g
Step 2: Click on button goToHomepage -> Navigate to page '/en'
Step 3: Click on link promotions -> Navigate to page '/en/p'
Step 4: Click on image promocode -> Navigate to page '/en/p/WEMHXRWX'
Step 5: Click on button close -> Navigate to page '/en/p'
Step 6: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Search and Buy Pass from Homepage
Description: Navigate to the homepage, perform a search for a specific pass, and complete the purchase process while verifying the home page.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /en
Step 2: Click on div searchTrigger
Step 3: Enter input value in input search
Step 4: Click on link automationTestPass -> Navigate to page '/en/passes/*/*'
Step 5: Click on button buyPass -> Navigate to page ''
Step 6: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Book Tickets for Live Event and Complete Checkout
Description: Navigate to the English page, select a live event, book tickets, and fill in personal details. Confirm the booking and verify the checkout process.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /en
Step 2: Click on link events -> Navigate to page '/en/collections/e'
Step 3: Click on link eventLive -> Navigate to page '/en/events/bruno-mars-live/*'
Step 4: Click on button bookNow -> Navigate to page '/booking/*/sessions'
Step 5: Click on button sessionDate -> Navigate to page '/booking/*/tickets'
Step 6: Click on button ticketQuantity (addQuantity)
Step 7: Click on button addTicketQuantity
Step 8: Click on button confirm -> Navigate to page '/checkout'
Step 9: Click on button checkout -> Navigate to page '/checkout/patron'
Step 10: Click on input fullName
Step 11: Enter input value in input fullName
Step 12: Click on input email
Step 13: Enter input value in input email
Step 14: Click on input confirmEmail
Step 15: Enter input value in input confirmEmail
Step 16: Click on input phone
Step 17: Enter input value in input phone
Step 18: Click on div indiaOption
Step 19: Click on input phoneNumber
Step 20: Enter input value in input phoneNumber
Step 21: Click on button confirmDetails -> Navigate to page '/checkout/payment'
Step 22: Click on link termsAndConditions
Step 23: Click on button back -> Navigate to page ''
Step 24: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
